menu_item.descript: it's the checkers staple. a ¼ pound all-beef hamburger served on a fresh, toasted sesame seed bun, with all the delicious toppings like ketchup, dill pickles, onions, crisp lettuce, a slice of ripe tomato, and mustard
the champ burger you love, only this time with a slice of american cheese.
two ¼ pound juicy all-beef hamburgers served on a toasted bun, with all the extras: mayonnaise, ketchup, pickles, onions, crisp lettuce, a slice of tomato and mustard.

this ultimate burger comes complete with a ¼ pound all-beef patty, two crispy strips of bacon served on a toasted bun, topped off with a slice of american cheese, mayonnaise, ketchup, pickles, onions, lettuce, a slice of tomato and mustard
this hot-off-the-grill burger is a juicy, all-beef patty served on a toasted bun with all the toppings you want: mayonnaise, ketchup, pickles, onions, lettuce, tomatoes and mustard.
think you can handle this? it's two all-beef patties served on a freshly toasted bun and topped with mayonnaise, ketchup, pickles, onions, crisp lettuce, tomatoes and mustard.
it's the checker double decker burger you love plus two slices of american cheese on each patty.
menu_item.itemname: Checker Double Decker Burger With Cheese

menu_item.descript: this signature burger is two juicy, all-beef patties and two slices of american cheese on a toasted bun. it's loaded with mayonnaise, ketchup, pickles, onions, crisp lettuce, tomatoes and mustard

this big, flavorful burger is three hand-seasoned, all-beef patties topped with three slices of american cheese and served on a freshly toasted sesame seed bun. it's comes complete with ketchup, pickles, chopped onions and mustard
this mouthwatering burger has two juicy, all-beef patties and two slices of american cheese served on a toasted bun. it features two strips of bacon, ketchup, pickles, chopped onions and mustard.
this smaller treat has an all-beef patty on a fresh toasted bun topped off with ketchup, pickles and mustard
available as a three-piece meal or two-piece snack, these premium chicken strips will keep you coming back for more
two of our homestyle chicken strips sandwiched between a toasted sesame bun and topped with lettuce, tomato and mayonnaise.
this kickin' hot chicken sandwich is served on a toasted bun with mayonnaise and lettuce.
our spicy chicken breast filet is dunked in frank's redhot original buffalo wing sauce and then topped with ranch dressing and lettuce, all served on a toasted sesame seed bun.
this deep sea delight is a white fish filet on a toasted bun, topped off with sweet tartar sauce and crisp lettuce.
our doubled up fish sandwich comes on a toasted bun and features two white fish filets, fresh american cheese, tartar sauce and crisp lettuce.
this american classic is an all-beef dog on a freshly toasted bun, topped off with ketchup and mustard
this all-beef dog on a toasted hot bun is smothered with a tasty all-beef chili and then stacked with onions, ketchup and mustard.
our delicious chili dog smothered with creamy cheese sauce.
(sweetened and unsweetened)
experience our famously hot, crisp, battered fries in sizes small, medium, and large. our fries are always salted, seasoned, and made just for you
hot cheese sauce, creamy ranch dressing and bacon pieces make our famous fries down right legendary
these ice-cold, smooth, creamy milkshakes come in banana, vanilla, chocolate, strawberry, and special seasonal flavors.
this delicious, golden pie is bursting with cinnamon apples and rolled in sweet cinnamon sugar.
